paper_abstract: In this communication we present a simple modification of the method of fundamental solutions applied to Stokes problems, which allows to make coincident the source and collocation points. It is based on a special treatment of the singular kernel evaluations, where spatially averaged quantities are considered by using auxiliary (or fictitious) Stokeslets. The method is still truly meshless and easy to implement. (C) 2012 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The method of fundamental solutions without fictitious boundary for solving Stokes problems
